Plot: Good natured Reverend Henry Biggs finds that his marriage to choir mistress Julia is flagging, due to his constant absence caring for the deprived neighborhood they live in. On top of all ...
Title: The Preacher's Wife
Writer: Robert Nathan (novel), Robert E. Sherwood (earlier screenplay), Leonardo Bercovici (earlier screenplay), Nat Mauldin (screenplay), Allan Scott (screenplay)
Actors: Denzel Washington, Whitney Houston, Courtney B. Vance, Gregory Hines
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.
